bookmark.title: FFT Power Spectrum with sliding window
bookmark.description: Converts time domain signal to spectrogram by performing ffts at regular intervals.

bookmark.title: FFT Power Spectral Density
bookmark.description: Converts time domain signal to spectrogram by performing ffts at regular intervals and normalizing by frequency.

bookmark.title: FFT Linear Spectral Density
bookmark.description: Converts time domain signal to spectrogram using sqrt of PSD.

bookmark.title: FFT Linear Spectrum and other DFT outputs.
bookmark.description: Converts time domain signal to spectrogram using sqrt of fftPower.

bookmark.title: Hanning
bookmark.description: Runs a Hanning window before taking the fft

bookmark.title: FFT
bookmark.description: Returns real and imaginary components of Fourier transform

bookmark.title: FFT and magnitude
bookmark.description: Returns real and imaginary components of Fourier transform, then take magnitude

bookmark.title: Mean
bookmark.description: Average the entire dataset

bookmark.title: Median
bookmark.description: Average returning the middle value over the dataset

bookmark.title: Mode
bookmark.description: Average returning the most frequently occuring value in the dataset

bookmark.title: Collapse Zeroth Dimension
bookmark.description: Average over the zeroth dimension to reduce the dimensionality

bookmark.title: Collapse First Dimension
bookmark.description: Average over the first dimension to reduce the dimensionality

bookmark.title: Collapse Second Dimension
bookmark.description: Average over the second dimension to reduce the dimensionality

bookmark.title: Collapse a Range of Indeces of Second Dimension
bookmark.description: Average over a subset of second dimension to reduce the dimensionality

bookmark.title: Apply Index
bookmark.description: Extract a subset of the data, along an index.

bookmark.title: Contour
bookmark.description: Calculates the contours at the given levels.

bookmark.title: dbAbovebackgroundDim1
bookmark.description: Shows data as decibels above a specified percentile level

bookmark.title: Detrend
bookmark.description: Removes DC and low-frequency components by subtracting out smooth of a function.

bookmark.title: Detrend Rank 2 Waveform
bookmark.description: Removes DC and low-frequency components over the first dimension (not zeroth).

bookmark.title: Normalize
bookmark.description: Normalize the data so that the maximum value is 1.

bookmark.title: Grid
bookmark.description: Flattened n,3 data is formed into table of x[i],y[j]->z[i,j].

bookmark.title: Flatten
bookmark.description: Flattens a rank 2 table. The result is a n,3 bundle dataset of [x,y,z].

bookmark.title: Flatten Waveform
bookmark.description: Flattens a rank 2 waveform into a single-index dataset with DEPEND_0.

bookmark.title: Histogram
bookmark.description: Perform an "auto" histogram of the data that automatically sets bins

bookmark.title: Log Histogram
bookmark.description: Perform the auto histogram in log space

bookmark.title: Histogram2d
bookmark.description: Perform a 2-D histogram of X and Y to create a rank 2 table.

bookmark.title: Bin Average 2D
bookmark.description: Perform a 2-D bin average X, Y, Z scatter to create a rank 2 table.

bookmark.title: Reduce resolution In Zeroth Dimension
bookmark.description: Reduces data to selected time/data intervals

bookmark.title: Decimate
bookmark.description: Keep every 4th measurement.

bookmark.title: Slice0
bookmark.description: Slice the zeroth dimension at selected index

bookmark.title: Slice1
bookmark.description: Slice the first dimension at selected index

bookmark.title: Slices
bookmark.description: Slice several dimensions at once

bookmark.title: Magnitude
bookmark.description: calculate the magnitude of the cartesian vectors.

bookmark.title: Trim
bookmark.description: Trim the data to a smaller range

bookmark.title: Smooth
bookmark.description: Smooth Filter removes high-frequency components with the boxcar

bookmark.title: Smooth Over Dimension
bookmark.description: Smooth Filter over the first dimension

bookmark.title: Total Over a Dimension
bookmark.description: Totals over a dimension to reduce the dimensionality.

bookmark.title: Transpose
bookmark.description: Transpose the rank 2 dataset.

bookmark.title: Polar to Cartesian
bookmark.description: Rank 2 bundle of [ radius, angle, Z ] is converted to cartesian coordinates.

bookmark.title: Unbundle
bookmark.description: Unbundles a component

bookmark.title: Rebundle
bookmark.description: Unbundles and rebundles components

bookmark.title: Valid
bookmark.description: Replaces data with 1 where valid and 0 where invalid

bookmark.title: Extent
bookmark.description: returns a range (min,max) for the data

bookmark.title: Get Property
bookmark.description: Replace the dataset with one of its properties, for example DEPEND_0 to get its timetags.

bookmark.title: Put Property
bookmark.description: Insert a property value into a dataset's properties.

bookmark.title: Set Valid Range
bookmark.description: Set the limits of the data.

bookmark.title: Set Fill Value
bookmark.description: Set the numerical value marking invalid data.

bookmark.title: Time Shift
bookmark.description: Shift the data in time by this amount.

bookmark.title: Monotonic Subset
bookmark.description: Ensure the data is monotonically increasing by removing records.

bookmark.title: Sort In Time
bookmark.description: Sort data by the time (or tags) found in DEPEND_0.

bookmark.title: Absolute Value
bookmark.description: Takes absolute value of dataset

bookmark.title: Accum
bookmark.description: Returns the running sum of a rank 1 dataSet

bookmark.title: Add
bookmark.description: Add a scalar

bookmark.title: Subtract
bookmark.description: Subtract a scalar

bookmark.title: Divide
bookmark.description: Divide by a scalar

bookmark.title: Multiply
bookmark.description: Multiply by a scalar

bookmark.title: Negate
bookmark.description: Flips the sign of the dataSet

bookmark.title: Diff
bookmark.description: Returns the finite differences between adjacent elements in a rank 1 dataSet

bookmark.title: Exponent
bookmark.description: Takes the dataset, ds, to the given exponent [exp10() = pow(10,ds)]

bookmark.title: Sqrt
bookmark.description: Takes the square root

bookmark.title: Pow
bookmark.description: Takes the power(ds,n)

bookmark.title: Natural Log
bookmark.description: Takes the natural logarithm of the data

bookmark.title: Log Base 10
bookmark.description: Takes the base-10 log of the data

bookmark.title: Detrend
bookmark.description: Removes DC and low-frequency components by subtracting out smooth of a function.

bookmark.title: Median Boxcar
bookmark.description: Finds and returns the boxcar median of the dataset

bookmark.title: Smooth
bookmark.description: Finds and returns the boxcar average of a rank 1 dataSet

bookmark.title: Cosine
bookmark.description: Finds the cosine of the dataset

bookmark.title: Sine
bookmark.description: Finds the sine of the dataset

bookmark.title: toDegrees
bookmark.description: Converts from Radians to Degrees

bookmark.title: toRadians
bookmark.description: Converts from Degrees to Radians

bookmark.title: Butterworth
bookmark.description: Performs Butterworth notch filter, including or excluding a band.

bookmark.title: Clean Data
bookmark.description: Remove outliers from the data, more than N sigma from the mean.

bookmark.title: setUnits
bookmark.description: Resets current units to new units

bookmark.title: setDepend0Units
bookmark.description: Resets current DEPEND_0 units to new units

bookmark.title: setDepend0Cadence
bookmark.description: Resets current DEPEND_0 cadence to new cadence (scalar and units)

bookmark.title: setDepend1Cadence
bookmark.description: Resets current DEPEND_1 cadence to new cadence (scalar and units)

bookmark.title: expandWaveform
bookmark.description: assign fake timetags for waveform data points so that gaps are filled.

bookmark.title: expandToFillGaps
bookmark.description: assign fake timetags to spectral data so that gaps are filled.
